scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev --workspace @timesheet/api" "npm run dev --workspace @timesheet/web"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @timesheet/shared && npm run build --workspace @timesheet/api && npm run build --workspace @timesheet/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace @timesheet/shared && npm run typecheck --workspace @timesheet/api && npm run typecheck --workspace @timesheet/web
scripts.infra:migrate:staging: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.staging.yml --env-file infra/env/.env.staging run --rm api-migrate
scripts.infra:seed:staging: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.staging.yml --env-file infra/env/.env.staging run --rm api-seed
